attributes.action: Complain to UN re appointment of Saudi Arabia to Chair of Human Rights Council
attributes.background: Saudi Arabia routinely use torture, amputation and crucifixion as punishment. They do this publicly as they do execution by stoning and beheading. This is barbarism and flagrant, consistent abuse of Human Rights.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109019
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
